name: PlantBot
0:
”Alexa open Plant bot”
”Set alert temperature as 42”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: plant bot
des:
Plant Bot enables following key features that are demonstrated in the video:

* Real time alerts based on telemetry device data
* Present contextual data, saving non-productive time of search and aggregate data
* Voice enabled hands free interface

In order to test Plant Bot there is a software/simulator developed that emulates real hardware setup.
Please visit the link and go to Try it:
http://servicebot.valueinnovation.co.in/plantbot/index.html

Detailed instructions for using the skill along with Plant Bot simulator are provided on the web page.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
